text: The Venn diagram shows the probabilities of members of a social club taking part in charitable activities. 4 R A represents taking part in an archery competition. ﬂ R represents taking part in a raffle. ° F represents taking part in a fun run. ' The probability that a member takes part in the archery o F competition or the raffle is 0.6. a Find the value of x and the value of y. (2 marks) b Show that events R and F are not independent. (3 marks)
